title: 2-D Printer
detail: Have you ever wanted to put tiny text on a handwritten notesheet or forge a signature?
extended_details:
Then this is the product for you!
This device will take a digital input, (most likely in the form of an image or PDF), and will write it out with a pen/pencil on 8.5x11 paper. This project will require many, modular steps from figuring out how to interpret the given document, conversion to an arduino-readable format (which will likely be similar to G-Code), and the mechanical design and assembly of the device.
